title: "History of Money" Study
marks: Signature, Title and Date on back on heading band, in black: [HISTORY OF MON
description: woven in oranges, golds, browns, tans, multicolored cream and pink; upper middle section with dark brown letter on cream with pink and silver and tan background; slanted diagonal section descending from URC and widening toward middle in cream/pink and tan; heading band on back
